languages.text: "Дальше — больше. Охрана в зубы давать почти перестала — ей запретили. Зато надзиратели стали считать, кто сколько накопал в карьере или там в шахте киркой настучал, и вывешивать этот, ну, список лучших! И тех, кто в том списке, и еще хорошим поведением отличался — тех принимали в оптиматы. Это как аристократия, но из нас, паршивых арестантов".

traits.locale_text: "Дальше — больше. Охрана в зубы давать почти перестала — ей запретили. Зато надзиратели стали считать, кто сколько накопал в карьере или там в шахте киркой настучал, и вывешивать этот, ну, список лучших! И тех, кто в том списке, и еще хорошим поведением отличался — тех принимали в оптиматы. Это как аристократия, но из нас, паршивых арестантов".

languages.text: "Things only went downhill from there. The guards quit it with the teeth punching — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and then, would you believe it, they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's the upper crust among us jailbirds."
languages.original_text: "Дальше — больше. Охрана в зубы давать почти перестала — ей запретили. Зато надзиратели стали считать, кто сколько накопал в карьере или там в шахте киркой настучал, и вывешивать этот, ну, список лучших! И тех, кто в том списке, и еще хорошим поведением отличался — тех принимали в оптиматы. Это как аристократия, но из нас, паршивых арестантов".

traits.locale_text: "Things only went downhill from there. No more teeth punches from the guards — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's like aristocracy among us jailbirds."

"Things only went downhill from there. No more teeth punches from the guards — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's like aristocracy among us jailbirds."

Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and then, would you believe it, they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's the upper crust among us jailbirds."

"Things only went downhill from there. The guards quit it with the teeth punching — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and then, would you believe it, they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's the upper crust among us jailbirds."

"Things only went downhill from there. The guards quit it with the teeth punching — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and then, would you believe it, they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's the upper crust among us jailbirds."

"Things only went downhill from there. The guards quit it with the teeth punching — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and then, would you believe it, they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's the upper crust among us jailbirds."

languages.text: «A partir de ahí, todo fue a peor. Los guardias dejaron de dar puñetazos en los dientes a los presos, pues el alcaide lo prohibió. En su lugar, los supervisores empezaron a contar qué prisioneros sacaban más cosas en la cantera o usaban sus picos con más energía o algo así. Y luego, se lo crea o no, ¡hicieron una lista de los mejores trabajadores! Y si alguien de esa lista también mostraba buen comportamiento, lo ascendían a optimate, la crema y nata de entre los reclusos».
languages.original_text: "Things only went downhill from there. The guards quit it with the teeth punching — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and then, would you believe it, they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's the upper crust among us jailbirds."

traits.locale_text: «A partir de ahí, todo fue a peor. Los guardias dejaron de dar puñetazos en los dientes a los presos, pues el alcaide lo prohibió. En su lugar, los supervisores empezaron a contar qué prisioneros sacaban más cosas en la cantera o usaban sus picos con más energía o algo así. Y luego, se lo crea o no, ¡hicieron una lista de los mejores trabajadores! Y si alguien de esa lista también mostraba buen comportamiento, lo ascendían a optimate, la crema y nata de entre los reclusos».

languages.text: "Von da an ging es bergab. Die Wachen haben mit dem Fressepolieren aufgehört — der Direktor hat es ihnen verboten. Stattdessen haben die Aufseher angefangen zu zählen, welche Gefangenen im Steinbruch mehr Dinge ausgegraben haben oder ihre Spitzhacke fester geschwungen haben oder was auch immer — und dann, ob Ihr's glaubt oder nicht, haben sie eine Liste der besten Arbeiter erstellt! Und wenn jemand auf dieser Liste auch noch gute Führung gezeigt hat, dann wird er zum Optimaten befördert. Das ist die oberste Schicht unter uns Knastbrüdern."
languages.original_text: "Things only went downhill from there. The guards quit it with the teeth punching — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and then, would you believe it, they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's the upper crust among us jailbirds."

traits.locale_text: "Von da an ging es bergab. Die Wachen haben mit dem Fressepolieren aufgehört — der Direktor hat es ihnen verboten. Stattdessen haben die Aufseher angefangen zu zählen, welche Gefangenen im Steinbruch mehr Dinge ausgegraben haben oder ihre Spitzhacke fester geschwungen haben oder was auch immer — und dann, ob Ihr's glaubt oder nicht, haben sie eine Liste der besten Arbeiter erstellt! Und wenn jemand auf dieser Liste auch noch gute Führung gezeigt hat, dann wird er zum Optimaten befördert. Das ist die oberste Schicht unter uns Knastbrüdern."

languages.text: « Après ça, tout est parti à vau-l'eau. Les gardes ont arrêté de nous frapper ; interdit par le directeur. Au lieu de ça, les superviseurs se sont mis à regarder quels prisonniers remontaient le plus de matos de la carrière, ou qui balançait sa pioche plus fort que les autres... et croyez-le ou non, ils ont dressé une liste des meilleurs travailleurs ! Et si en plus quelqu'un dans cette liste avait un bon comportement, il était choisi pour devenir un élu. Le gratin de la société carcérale, en gros. »
languages.original_text: "Things only went downhill from there. The guards quit it with the teeth punching — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and then, would you believe it, they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's the upper crust among us jailbirds."

traits.locale_text: « Après ça, tout est parti à vau-l'eau. Les gardes ont arrêté de nous frapper ; interdit par le directeur. Au lieu de ça, les superviseurs se sont mis à regarder quels prisonniers remontaient le plus de matos de la carrière, ou qui balançait sa pioche plus fort que les autres... et croyez-le ou non, ils ont dressé une liste des meilleurs travailleurs ! Et si en plus quelqu'un dans cette liste avait un bon comportement, il était choisi pour devenir un élu. Le gratin de la société carcérale, en gros. »

languages.text: “在那之后，情况就越来越糟糕了。那些看守不再一拳把犯人的牙打掉，因为典狱长不准他们这么做。相反，那些监工开始计算哪些犯人在采石场挖得更多，挥镐更卖力，或者其他什么东西。他们居然还列了份优秀工人名单，你敢信吗？如果名单上的工人品行也不错，他们还会被认定为‘典范’，也就是我们这些犯人里的上流人物。”
languages.original_text: "Things only went downhill from there. The guards quit it with the teeth punching — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and then, would you believe it, they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's the upper crust among us jailbirds."

traits.locale_text: “在那之后，情况就越来越糟糕了。那些看守不再一拳把犯人的牙打掉，因为典狱长不准他们这么做。相反，那些监工开始计算哪些犯人在采石场挖得更多，挥镐更卖力，或者其他什么东西。他们居然还列了份优秀工人名单，你敢信吗？如果名单上的工人品行也不错，他们还会被认定为‘典范’，也就是我们这些犯人里的上流人物。”

languages.text: 「そこから事態は悪化の一途をたどった。看守たちは殴ることをやめた…所長が禁止したからな。その代わりに、刑務官たちは、どの囚人が採石場でより多くのものを掘り出しているか、ツルハシをより激しく振り回しているかなどを数え始めた。そして、信じられないことに、奴らは最も優秀な作業員のリストを作ったんだ！そのリストに載った者が優秀な行動を示せば、その時点でそいつはオプティメイトに昇格する。それが俺たち囚人のピラミッドの上にいる上流階級の奴らさ」
languages.original_text: "Things only went downhill from there. The guards quit it with the teeth punching — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and then, would you believe it, they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's the upper crust among us jailbirds."

traits.locale_text: 「そこからは、どんどん下り坂さ。看守達は殴ることをやめた…所長が禁止したからな。代わりに刑務官達は、採石場で他の連中よりたくさん採石している囚人、ツルハシを一生懸命振っている囚人を集計し始めた — 信じられるか、奴らは優秀な作業員のリストを作ったんだ！それで、そのリストに載った者が優秀な行動を示せば、その時点でそいつはオプティマテスに昇格する。それが俺たち囚人のピラミッドの上にいる奴らさ」

「そこから事態は悪化の一途をたどった。看守たちは殴ることをやめた…所長が禁止したからな。その代わりに、刑務官たちは、どの囚人が採石場でより多くのものを掘り出しているか、ツルハシをより激しく振り回しているかなどを数え始めた。そして、信じられないことに、奴らは最も優秀な作業員のリストを作ったんだ！そのリストに載った者が優秀な行動を示せば、その時点でそいつはオプティメイトに昇格する。それが俺たち囚人のピラミッドの上にいる上流階級の奴らさ」

languages.text: "İşler sonrasında hepten yokuş aşağı gitti. Gardiyanlar surat yamultmayı bıraktı, müdür yasakladı. Onun yerine gözetmenler hangi mahkûmun ocakta daha fazla malzeme çıkarttığını, kazmasını daha sert salladığını falan saymaya başladı. Sonra da inanır mısınız, en iyi işçilerin listesini çıkardılar! Bu listedeki biri iyi hâl gösterirse de optimate oluyordu. Biz hapishane kuşları arasındaki üst tabakaya çıkıyordu yani."
languages.original_text: "Things only went downhill from there. The guards quit it with the teeth punching — the warden forbade them. Instead, the overseers started counting which prisoners were digging up more things in the quarry or swinging their pickaxes harder or whatnot — and then, would you believe it, they put together a list of best workers! And if someone on that list also showed good behaviour, that's when they'd get promoted to an optimate. That's the upper crust among us jailbirds."

Onun yerine gözetmenler hangi mahkûmun ocakta daha fazla malzeme çıkarttığını, kazmasını daha sert salladığını falan saymaya başladı. Sonra da inanır mısınız, en iyi işçilerin listesini çıkardılar! Bu listedeki biri iyi hâl gösterirse de optimate oluyordu. Biz hapishane kuşları arasındaki üst tabakaya çıkıyordu yani."
